name: Labyrinths of the World: Lost Island Collector's Edition
name_original: Labyrinths of the World: Lost Island Collector's Edition
description: When dangerous cataclysmic events across the world coincide with your brother’s disappearance, you’re sent on the Seekers mission of a lifetime! Your investigation quickly turns dire when you find a dangerous criminal trying to destroy the worlds and your brother helping the enemy! Can you save your brother and the worlds in time? Find out in this exhilarating Hidden-Object Puzzle adventure!
